email.subject: Urgent Action Required
email.body: Click here http://malicious-site.com to verify immediately.

email.body: Please review the updated leave policy document attached.

email.subject: Confidential Request
email.body: Are you available? I need you to urgently process a wire transfer.

email.body: We detected a login from Chennai. If this was you, ignore.

email.subject: Security Alert
email.body: Unusual activity detected. Verify at http://secure-paypai.com

email.body: Your subscription payment failed. Update at https://netflix.com

email.body: Download the patch attached and install immediately.

email.body: See who viewed your profile this week.

email.body: Attached is the invoice for Q4.

email.body: Attached are the meeting notes from today.
